data.name: Left-align Xero field labels
data.description:
If you love Xero and just wish it had left aligned-field labels, this style is for you.
Forces most right-aligned field labels to left-aligned in Xero.

data.name: LiveNirvana Dark Theme
我的115优化
PlayCanvas Docs dark theme
Twitter Without borders and circles!
data.description:
No borders, no circles! this css is intended for profiles that use transparent pngs, normally if someone uses a transparent png image, when entering the user's profile you see a background, this css fixes that problem by removing the background. works on mobile twitter, web client and tweetdeck (this is my first css sorry)
(web client based on: https://userstyles.org/styles/145712/twitter-back-to-square )

data.name: kvraudio off-white forum
data.description:

data.name: ANN Dark Theme
data.description:

The whole site is aligned in the center now.
